dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3725 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the individual health insurance mandate.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tiberi (for himself and Mr. Burgess) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the individual health insurance mandate.

section.header: Repeal of individual health insurance mandate

subsection.text: Section 5000A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following:
This section shall not apply with respect to any month beginning after December 31, 2017.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to months beginning after December 31, 2017.
